solution_line_template: He ordered {num_pizzas} pizzas, each cut into {slices_per_pizza} slices so that's {num_pizzas}*{slices_per_pizza} = <<{num_pizzas}*{slices_per_pizza}={total_slices}>>{total_slices} slices
Stephen ate {stephen_percent_num}% of the pizza so he ate {stephen_percent_decimal}*{total_slices} = <<{stephen_percent_num}*{percent_factor}*{total_slices}={stephen_slices}>>{stephen_slices} slices

{after_stephen_slices} slices are left and Pete eats {pete_percent_num}% of {after_stephen_slices} slices so he eats {after_stephen_slices}*{pete_percent_decimal} = <<{after_stephen_slices}*{pete_percent_num}*{percent_factor}={pete_slices}>>{pete_slices} slices

If there were {after_stephen_slices} slices and Pete ate {pete_slices} slices then there are {after_stephen_slices}-{pete_slices} = <<{after_stephen_slices}-{pete_slices}={answer}>>{answer} slices left over
